gameDetails.name: Last Night on Earth 'Stock Up' Supplement
gameDetails.description: The 'Stock Up' Supplement is a Web-exclusive for Last Night on Earth: The Zombie Game and features a new scenario and ten new game cards. All pieces are printed on the same high-quality card stock as the boardgame. The cards are exclusive to this supplement and will not be available anywhere else. They feature all new artwork and some new game mechanics, such as 'Sacrifice'.
